titleStmt.title: Dendrologia Dodona's grove, or, the vocall forrest. By I.H. Esqr.
titleStmt.author: Howell, James, 1594?-1666.
Merian, Matthaeus, 1593-1650, engraver.

biblFull.extent: [12], 32, 39-135, 166-219, [1] p., [2] leaves of plates : ill. (metal cut)

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed] By: T[homas]: B[adger]: for H: Mosley at the Princes Armes in St Paules Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: "A political allegory in prose dealing with events between 1603 and 1640"--DNB.
First word of title in Greek characters.
Running title reads: Dodona's grove, or the vocall forrest.
The engravings are signed by Matthaeus Merian.
Variant (possibly an early state): lacking A² .
Reproduction of the original in the University of Minnesota. Library.

place.placeName: the Princes Armes in St Paules Church-yard
